messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Not receiving e-mails
messages.msgSnippet: LOL It s my fault..I ve been away...!! Don t worry though, I m back! I ll get some chatter going LOL! MamaBeth pam sorooshian  wrote: If
messages.messageBody:
LOL It's my fault..I've been away...!! Don't worry though, I'm back! I'll get some chatter going LOL!

MamaBeth

pam sorooshian <pamsoroosh@...> wrote:
If people have been sending emails that are not going through, please
write directly to the listowners at
<UnschoolingDiscussion-listowner@yahoogroups.com> OR directly to me at
<pamsoroosh@...>.

As far as I can tell there have been very very few posts in the last
couple of days. I can't see anything wrong with the list, just that
people are not posting.

I'll write directly offlist to the person who has AOL and is having
problems.

-pam sorooshian
listowner, UnschoolingDiscussion

messages.subject: Re: Not receiving e-mails
messages.msgSnippet: ... receiving ... I have ... i don t know what to tell you, other than check your spam folder if you are on 9.0. they ve been dumping a lot in there that
messages.messageBody:
--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, gailbrocop@a... wrote:
>
> AOL Technical Help told me to contact this address. I have stopped
receiving
> e-mails from a group called UnschoolingDiscussions@yahoogroups.com
I have
> contacted AOL about this 3 times and am quite frustrated.
>
> Please advise as to what I can do to correct this situation.
>
> Gail HIggins
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]


i don't know what to tell you, other than check your spam folder if
you are on 9.0. they've been dumping a lot in there that doesn't
belong, and doing weird things because of this newest email virus,
the mydoom worm. and technical support via the 800 number is
basically useless in general, LOL.

even yahoo is blocking email with certain subjects, see the important
message at the top of the page of your yahoo groups:
groups.yahoo.com.....

i read this group at the website when i have the time, not often
because of the volume, but i noticed the volume is strangely down
from what i remember....maybe others aren't getting their mail
either, and won't even see your request...

ang, posting from the website....an email i sent here a little
earlier is not showing up here either....

messages.subject: Not receiving e-mails
messages.msgSnippet: AOL Technical Help told me to contact this address.  I have stopped receiving e-mails from a group called UnschoolingDiscussions@yahoogroups.com.  I have
messages.messageBody:
AOL Technical Help told me to contact this address. I have stopped receiving
e-mails from a group called UnschoolingDiscussions@yahoogroups.com. I have
contacted AOL about this 3 times and am quite frustrated.

Please advise as to what I can do to correct this situation.

Gail HIggins
